inclusion.criterion: Spinal Cord Injury (SCI) or other neurogenic bladder patient requiring a chronic
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: indwelling urinary catheter with history of catheter blockage and/or encrustation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Screening within 30 days of first treatment
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Systemic antibiotics within 7 days of first treatment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Investigational drug or device within 30 days of enrollment
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Current infection that requires treatment with systemic antibiotics
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Recent history of significant autonomic dysreflexia (requiring intervention or treatment)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CVA, neurogenic bladder with indwelling suprapubic catheter and recurrent UTIs. Urologist not concerned with leaking around cath site.
